statements: SELECT * FROM medication_allergies WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT allergy_name, severity FROM medication_allergies WHERE allergy_type = 'Food';
SELECT recorded_date, allergy_name FROM medication_allergies WHERE patient_id = 200 ORDER BY recorded_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM medication_allergies WHERE allergy_name LIKE 'Pen%' AND severity = 'Severe';
SELECT DISTINCT allergy_type FROM medication_allergies ORDER BY allergy_type ASC, severity DESC;
SELECT * FROM medication_allergies WHERE allergy_type = 'Food' ORDER BY severity DESC, recorded_date ASC
SELECT allergy_name, COUNT(*) as allergy_count FROM medication_allergies GROUP BY allergy_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT patient_id, MAX(recorded_date) as latest_recorded_date FROM medication_allergies GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY latest_recorded_date DESC
SELECT * FROM medication_allergies WHERE severity IN ('High', 'Medium') AND recorded_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT allergy_type FROM medication_allergies
SELECT * FROM Medications
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT medication_name FROM Medications WHERE dosage = '10mg'
SELECT * FROM Allergies ORDER BY allergen_name ASC
SELECT patient_id, allergen_name FROM Allergies WHERE alert_status = TRUE
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_medications FROM Medications;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE medication_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT patient_id, allergen_name, alert_status FROM Allergies WHERE alert_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Medication_Allergies WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT medication_name, allergy_type FROM Medication_Allergies WHERE allergy_type = 'Severe' ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM Alerts WHERE patient_id = 456 ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(alert_id) AS num_alerts FROM Alerts GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_alerts > 1;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, allergy_type FROM Medication_Allergies WHERE patient_id = 12;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM Medication_Allergies WHERE allergy_type = 'Severe';
SELECT patient_id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM Alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE medication_id = 1;
SELECT allergy_name FROM Allergies WHERE allergy_id = 2;

SELECT medication_name, allergy_name FROM Medications JOIN PatientMedicationAllergies ON Medications.medication_id = PatientMedicationAllergies.medication_id JOIN Allergies ON PatientMedicationAllergies.allergy_id = Allergies.allergy_id;
SELECT alert_message, alert_type FROM Alerts WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE dosage = '10mg';
SELECT allergy_name FROM Allergies WHERE allergy_id = 3;

SELECT patient_id, medication_name, allergy_name FROM PatientMedicationAllergies JOIN Medications ON PatientMedicationAllergies.medication_id = Medications.medication_id JOIN Allergies ON PatientMedicationAllergies.allergy_id = Allergies.allergy_id;
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;

SELECT medication_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS patient_count FROM PatientMedicationAllergies JOIN Medications ON PatientMedicationAllergies.medication_id = Medications.medication_id GROUP BY medication_name HAVING patient_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_info;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_info ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT medication_name, medication_description FROM medication_list WHERE medication_id = 1;

SELECT first_name, last_name, medication_name FROM patient_info INNER JOIN medication_allergy ON patient_info.patient_id = medication_allergy.patient_id INNER JOIN medication_list ON medication_allergy.medication_id = medication_list.medication_id;
SELECT patient_id, alert_message FROM allergy_alert WHERE alert_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM patient_info ORDER BY first_name ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_info WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.medication_name FROM patient_info p JOIN medication_allergy ma ON p.patient_id = ma.patient_id JOIN medication_list m ON ma.medication_id = m.medication_id;

SELECT a.log_id, a.alert_date, aa.alert_message, p.first_name, p.last_name FROM alert_log a JOIN allergy_alert aa ON a.alert_id = aa.alert_id JOIN patient_info p ON aa.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE a.alert_status = 'active';
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, ma.allergy_description FROM patient_info p LEFT JOIN medication_allergy ma ON p.patient_id = ma.patient_id WHERE ma.allergy_description IS NOT NULL;
